name: LibreClinica
description: LibreClinica is a community-driven, open-source Electronic Data Capture (EDC) and Clinical Data Management (CDM) system for clinical research and trials, forked from OpenClinica.

notes.text: Change the default password (root / 12345678) immediately after first login!
Tomcat takes 60â€“90 seconds to deploy on first start. Database credentials are saved in ~/libreclinica.creds.
Configure SMTP settings in /opt/tomcat9/libreclinica.config/datainfo.properties before inviting users.
For production use, place behind an HTTPS reverse proxy (e.g. Nginx or Caddy).
